    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getApplicationBounds(int defaultX,
                                      int defaultY,
                                      int defaultWidth,
                                      int defaultHeight)
        Gets the last rectangle stored as the app bounds preference. If no bounds have been saved, yet then the default values will be used.
        Parameters:
        defaultX - the default x location
        defaultY - the default y location
        defaultWidth - the default width
        defaultHeight - the default height
        Returns:
        the last rectangle stored as the app bounds preference.

      • useSavedViewLayout

        public boolean usingSavedViewLayout()

      • saveViewLayout

        public void saveViewLayout()
        Saves the current view layout (fill percentages) to the preference store.

      • saveApplicationBounds

        public void saveApplicationBounds(java.awt.Rectangle rect)
        Saves the specified rectangle as the application bounds.
        Parameters:
        rect - the current application bounds
